org.eclipse.scada.vi.details.model

Interface GroupGridComponent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupGridComponentImpl

    public interface GroupGridComponent
extends Component
    A representation of the model object 'Group Grid Component'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Groups
    • Equally
    • Cols

    See Also:
    DetailViewPackage.getGroupGridComponent()

      • getGroups

         getGroups()
        Returns the value of the 'Groups' containment reference list. The list contents are of type GroupGridEntry.

        If the meaning of the 'Groups' containment reference list isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...
